annotations.description:
An example Laravel application with a SQLite database. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/luciddreamz/laravel-ex/blob/master/readme.md.

WARNING: Any data stored will be lost upon pod destruction. Only use this template for testing.

message:

annotations.description: Exposes and load balances the application pods
Keeps track of changes in the application image
Defines how to build the application
Defines how to deploy the application server

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: NAMESPACE
parameters.description: The OpenShift Namespace where the ImageStream resides.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_URL
parameters.description: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_REF
parameters.description: Set this to a branch name, tag or other ref of your repository if you are not using the default branch.

parameters.name: LARAVEL_APP_ENV
parameters.description: Determines the 'environment' your application is currently.

parameters.name: LARAVEL_APP_DEBUG
parameters.description: Enable or disable detailed error messages.

parameters.name: OPCACHE_REVALIDATE_FREQ
parameters.description: How often to check script timestamps for updates, in seconds. 0 will result in OPcache checking for updates on every request.

parameters.name: CLUSTER_NAME
parameters.description: The name of your current OpenShift cluster (console.CLUSTER_NAME.openshift.com).

parameters.name: ROUTER_SHARD
parameters.description: The router shard used by routes in your current OpenShift cluster (http://PROJECT_NAME-APPLICATION_NAME.ROUTER_SHARD.CLUSTER_NAME.openshiftapps.com/).

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory the Laravel container can use.

parameters.name: CONTEXT_DIR
parameters.description: Set this to the relative path to your project if it is not in the root of your repository.

parameters.name: APPLICATION_DOMAIN
parameters.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the Laravel service, if left blank a value will be defaulted.

parameters.name: GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: A secret string used to configure the GitHub webhook.

parameters.name: DATABASE_ENGINE
parameters.description: Database engine: mysql, pgsql, or sqlite (default).

parameters.name: LARAVEL_APP_KEY
parameters.description: Set this to a 32 character random string.
